answers.answer: That's awesome!  I don't take it, but my man has diabetes and he has to take it.

question: OK ladies I was shopping at Publix today.. And I turned a script in.. I just wanted to inform all of you ladies that use the drug Metformin ,,,30 day supply  of generic is on there free list so if you have a script for it you can get it for free they told me they just started this with Metformin... Just sharing some free news .. Hopes this helps anyone that uses this drug..
title: Shopping at Publix Today!!!!!
